ing.item: Bacon; crisply cooked and crumbled (about 1/2 cup)

directions.step:
HEAT waffle iron; grease if necessary. Beat baking mix, milk and eggs with wire whisk or hand beater until smooth. Stir in cheese and bacon.
POUR batter by scant 1 cupfuls onto center of hot waffle iron.
BAKE until steaming stops and waffle is golden brown. Carefully remove waffle. Twelve 4-inch squares.
